member.name: CWPSTRUCT
member.summary: Defines the message parameters passed to a WH_CALLWNDPROC hook procedure, /.

member.name: CWPSTRUCT.lParam
member.summary: Additional information about the message. The exact meaning depends on the message value.

member.name: CWPSTRUCT.wParam
member.summary: Additional information about the message. The exact meaning depends on the message value.

member.name: CWPSTRUCT.hwnd
member.summary: A handle to the window to receive the message.
